about_the_game:
Play as the Cat named Gossamergoober accompanied with an awesome sound track.

Run, jump, collect chicken and catch the bugs in this adorable platformer for anyone that loves cats.

Includes various game modes such that involve speed running or just casual fun over 13 varied stages and game modes.

Catch the Bugs Mode involves catching all of the bugs before Gossamergoober runs out of energy and falls asleep.

Find Barnicle Mode involves searching for and finding Barnicle the Elder Cat.

Set times for completing stages and try and get your best times for each mode and stage completion.

Search for collectable music boxes and unlock the sound track.

Unlock Trophies.

Access options that change the gameplay accessibility for casual play and music options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: An adorable platformer for anyone that loves cats.
